reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: The Husqvarna Automower integration needs to re-authenticate your account.

data.home_location: GPS Coordinates of the charging station.

data.gps_top_left: GPS Coordinates of the Top Left Image Corner
data.gps_bottom_right: GPS Coordinates of the Bottom Right Image Corner
data.mower_img_path: Path to the mower location image

error.invalid_str: Lat and Lon required, usa a comma to seperate
error.not_wgs84: Coordinates are not valid, not in WGS84 datum
error.cant_parse: Coordinates are not valid, lat and lon sperated by a comma in signed degree format
error.too_few_points: Must have atleast 3 points to define a zone
error.points_match: Top Left and Bottom Right coordinates can't be the same

application_credentials.description: Create an account on [Husqvarna develoeprs portal]({oauth_creds_url}). Connect The Authentication API and Automower Connect API. As redirect-URI set https://my.home-assistant.io/redirect/oauth. If you haven't set up My HomeAssistant already. Enter this URL for your instance {redirect_uri}
